Articles.Content:
Yes, it is true. The fireworks do generate thrust!  The only issue is if you have a lot of them firing, you get a lot of lag. The way around this is to set all the colors to black, then they do not appear. I discovered this by accident because I was using Mission Builder to place myself on Minmus and noticed that there is a bug that resets all your colors to black when you start the Mission.  Once I turn on the color, you can see the lag take effect.

You'll also notice that the cannisters are ricocheting off of the surface. 

It is not clear yet if there is an unlimited supply of cannisters. If that is the case, KSP now has an official Kraken drive.

I apologize for the poor quality of the video. Something is weird in my OBS settings and I need to do some troubleshooting.

 

 

Edited June 24, 2021 by Klapaucius
Only a matter of time before we see "Fireworks only to The Mun"!
